data.prayer: There are 2,464,900 people living in the county of Tiruvannamalai. Only about 27,114 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, move the 27,114 believers in the county of Tiruvannamalai to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Tiruvannamalai words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Arunthathiyar people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, India to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, India that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

location.name: Tiruvannamalai
location.people_groups_list: Mutali, Chakkiliyan (Hindu traditions), Paliyan, Kochu Velan, Chayakkaran
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mutali (41,000), Chakkiliyan (Hindu traditions) (857,000), Paliyan (10,000), Kochu Velan (200), Chayakkaran (41,000)
